metadata.title: CVE-2020-9281 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the HTML Data Processor forCKEditor 4.0 before 4.14 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary webscript through a crafted "protected" comment (with the cke_protectedsyntax).

criterions.comment: ckeditor: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
